description: The slow cooker makes the most tender stewed apple filling for this simple crumble.
keywords: Crumble,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Slow cooker,Peanut free
name: Slow Cooker Apple Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 large apples, peeled, cored and chopped into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place the apple wedges in the slow cooker, sprinkle with cinnamon, orange zest and juice and mix.
Blitz the oats and pecans to a coarse crumb in a food processor. Mix in the flour, brown sugar and melted butter.

Scatter the topping on the apples and place a sheet of parchment over the top of the slow cooker without touching the crumble. Place the lid on and cook on low for 3.5 hours. Remove the lid and parchment and cook for 10 more minutes.
